languages.text: {n}Странная безмятежность окутывает тело. Усталость отступает, и вы словно парите над землей и видите то, чего раньше не замечали: как тени в углах обретают форму и цвет. Как свет приглушенных люменов играет на костяных масках культистов. На них... точно маски? Слишком похожи на мертвецов — тощие, длинные, с пустыми глазницами. Холодок пробегает по позвоночнику.{/n}

{n}A strange, serene calm envelops your body. Your fatigue subsides and you seem to float in the air, seeing things you had not noticed before: the shadows in the corners taking on shape and colour. The subdued lumen light playing on the cultists' bone masks. Are they... really masks? Their tall, lean, empty-eyed wearers might as well be dead people. A chill runs down your spine.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Eine merkwürdige, friedliche Ruhe umhüllt deinen Körper. Deine Müdigkeit lässt nach und du scheinst in der Luft zu schweben. Du siehst Dinge, die du zuvor nicht gesehen hast: Die Schatten in den Ecken nehmen Form und Farbe an. Das gedämpfte Lumen-Licht tanzt auf den Knochenmasken der Kultisten. Sind das ... wirklich Masken? Ihre großen, schlanken, hohläugigen Träger könnten ebenso gut Tote sein. Dir läuft es eiskalt den Rücken hinunter.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A strange, serene calm envelops your body. Du siehst Dinge, die du zuvor nicht gesehen hast: Die Schatten in den Ecken nehmen Form und Farbe an. Das gedämpfte Lumen-Licht tanzt auf den Knochenmasken der Kultisten. Sind das ... wirklich Masken? Ihre großen, schlanken, hohläugigen Träger könnten ebenso gut Tote sein. Dir läuft es eiskalt den Rücken hinunter.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Una calma extraña envuelve tu cuerpo. Tu agotamiento se aligera y te sientes flotar en el aire, capaz de ver cosas en las que no habías reparado antes. Las sombras de las esquinas toman forma y color. Los lumens se reflejan en las máscaras de hueso de los cultistas. ¿Son... máscaras de verdad? Sus portadores altos y delgados de mirada vacía bien podrían estar muertos. Un escalofrío te recorre la espalda.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A strange, serene calm envelops your body. The subdued lumen light playing on the cultists' bone masks. Are they... really masks? Their tall, lean, empty-eyed wearers might as well be dead people. A chill runs down your spine.{/n}

Sus portadores altos y delgados de mirada vacía bien podrían estar muertos. Un escalofrío te recorre la espalda.{/n}

languages.text: {n}不思議な静けさに体が包まれる。疲労が和らぎ、宙にでも浮いているかのような感覚を覚え、それまで気づけなかったものが見えてくる。隅の方の影は形と色を持っている。控えめなルーメンのライトが教団の骨の仮面を照らす。あれは…本当に仮面なのか？その背が高く、痩せており、虚ろな目をした仮面を着けた者たちはまるで死人のようだ。思わず背筋に冷たいものが走る。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A strange, serene calm envelops your body. Your fatigue subsides and you seem to float in the air, seeing things you had not noticed before: the shadows in the corners taking on shape and colour. The subdued lumen light playing on the cultists' bone masks. Are they... really masks? Their tall, lean, empty-eyed wearers might as well be dead people. A chill runs down your spine.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}不思議な静けさに体が包まれる。疲労が和らぎ、宙にでも浮いているかのような感覚を覚え、それまで気づけなかったものが見えてくる。隅の方の影は形と色を持っている。控えめなルーメンのライトが教団の骨の仮面を照らす。あれは…本当に仮面なのか？その背が高く、痩せており、虚ろな目をした仮面を着けた者たちはまるで死人のようだ。思わず背筋に冷たいものが走る。{/n}

languages.text: {n}你全身上下都笼罩在某种古怪的宁静之中。你感觉身体不再疲劳，似乎整个人都漂浮在空中，看到了你以往从来没留意过的景象。角落里的阴影浮现出了形状和颜色，柔和的流光照射在教派成员的骨质面具上。那些……真的是面具吗？戴着面具的人们又高又瘦，眼神空洞，仿佛死人一般，这一切让你毛骨悚然。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A strange, serene calm envelops your body. Your fatigue subsides and you seem to float in the air, seeing things you had not noticed before: the shadows in the corners taking on shape and colour. The subdued lumen light playing on the cultists' bone masks. Are they... really masks? Their tall, lean, empty-eyed wearers might as well be dead people. A chill runs down your spine.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你全身上下都笼罩在某种古怪的宁静之中。你感觉身体不再疲劳，似乎整个人都漂浮在空中，看到了你以往从来没留意过的景象。角落里的阴影浮现出了形状和颜色，柔和的流光照射在教派成员的骨质面具上。那些……真的是面具吗？戴着面具的人们又高又瘦，眼神空洞，仿佛死人一般，这一切让你毛骨悚然。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Une étrange sérénité s'empare de vous. Votre fatigue se dissipe et vous avez l'impression de vous élever dans les airs, de voir des choses que vous n'aviez encore jamais remarquées, à commencer par les ombres qui prennent forme et se parent de couleurs, dans les recoins du temple. La lumière tamisée des lumens qui se reflète sur les masques en os des cultistes. À ce propos, vous en venez à vous demander s'il s'agit véritablement de masques... Leurs porteurs, aux silhouettes décharnées et aux orbites creuses, pourraient tout aussi bien être des morts revenus d'outre-tombe. Un frisson vous parcourt l'échine à cette pensée.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A strange, serene calm envelops your body. The subdued lumen light playing on the cultists' bone masks. Are they... really masks? Their tall, lean, empty-eyed wearers might as well be dead people. A chill runs down your spine.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Tüm bedenini alışılmadık, huzurlu bir sakinlik sarıyor. Yorgunluğun diniyor. Havada süzülüyor gibisin, daha önce farkına varmadığın şeyleri görmeye başlıyorsun. Köşelerdeki gölgeler şekillenip renkleniyor. Dingin bir lümen ışığı, tarikatçıların kemik maskeleri üzerinde dans ediyor. Onlar... Gerçekten maske mi? Uzun, zayıf ve boş gözlerle bakan sahipleri ölü olsalar yeridir. Tüylerin diken diken oluyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A strange, serene calm envelops your body. Your fatigue subsides and you seem to float in the air, seeing things you had not noticed before: the shadows in the corners taking on shape and colour. The subdued lumen light playing on the cultists' bone masks. Are they... really masks? Their tall, lean, empty-eyed wearers might as well be dead people. A chill runs down your spine.{/n}
